mapper.select: SELECT c.reply_no, c.article_no, c.user_id, m.user_name, c.content, c.register_time FROM comment c JOIN members m ON c.user_id = m.user_id WHERE c.article_no = #{articleNo} ORDER BY c.reply_no ASC
SELECT c.reply_no, c.article_no, c.user_id, m.user_name, c.content, c.register_time FROM comment c JOIN members m ON c.user_id = m.user_id WHERE c.reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (article_no, user_id, content) VALUE (#{articleNo}, #{userId}, #{content})
